description: The perfect balance of comfort & convenience!This well maintained 3 bed, 3 bath townhome is nestled in a quiet Coquitlam culdesac & offers inviting spaces throughout. Enjoy a freshly painted interior & a refreshed kitchen with updated countertops & cabinet doors. The open concept main floor opens to a walk out patio & private fenced backyard, ideal 4 daily living & entertaining.Upstairs features 3 comfortable bdrooms, including a welcoming primary suite with ensuite.New blinds throughout the home add style & privacy. The lower level offers a double tandem garage with flexible storage or workspace, plus convenient driveway parking. Residents enjoy Timber Club amenities with pool, hot tub, gym & lounge.Mins to SkyTrain, Coq Ctr, Lafarge Lake & excellent schools.Do not miss this opportunity!
